text:
Condescending business. called to confirm closing time before coming. arrived before closing time (stated on website, and advice from staff), however staff leaving for home. lady staff who picked up my call feigned ignorance and walked past me. boss said his staff told him there was no more pending sales (despite my call prior) so they decided to close way before stated closing time.

Even though I'm already there, boss not interested because my purchase too small for them to entertain and to return at a time of their convenience. Staff can't be bothered to even make eye contact and chased me away

Not very friendly customer service on phone. Only asked for product indent and they don't want to even entertain end consumer, without even informing of the minimum order quantity. Called twice. One other time the staff tell me they could check on inventory if got stocks. Not even consistent with their replies.

I have the same experience of coming before stated closing time and do not want to entertain even if i'm already at their place, so i called the office to check if they are really closed, even didn't want to tell me what time they're open again. 2nd experience is the lady staff gave me the wrong order and refused to change, claiming it is my fault after i have repeated the sticker code twice. All the counter staff are very rude and ignorant.
21 April 2025-25 April 2025 Close for check store
Wholeseller for Vinyls n miscellaneous producys. Mainly used for signages. Well organised company with lots of variety of Vinyls from commercial use to vehicle wraps.
